info.author: Norman Bier and DataShop datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: This component will build a DataShop KC import from an OLI Skill Model.
info.inputs:
Skills ODS File - Download a skills model in open document format (ods). Assumptions about this file:
The tabs in your spreadsheet are ordered: Skills, Problems, LOs.
No blank rows in your spreadsheet
This only tests what's in the spreadsheet, it does not take into account what exists in your course tree.
Template kc model - Export a kc model from DataShop. Please do NOT use the "(new only)" option. Unique-step export is recommended.
info.outputs: DataShop KC model - You can import this into the dataset that you got the KC model export from.
